attributes.action: Make it easier for crb checks to be obtained by employers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment a person has to apply for a new CRB check for each post that he or she starts. 
For example i have a CRB check for my volunteer work, yet when apply for a new post i have had to wait more then nine weeks from the date of my interview for a new CRB check. 
I would like to see the CRB check made in to a card that can be used for all work undertaken in a set time. Say three years. With fingerprints and photo on a card. This would be a much better answer then the present system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
